definition:
A [*generalized Cartan matrix*]{} is a matrix $A$ whose diagonal entries
are all 2, and whose off-diagonal entries are nonpositive integers, such
that $a_{ij}=0$ if and only if $a_{ji}=0$. Such a matrix is called
[*symmetrizable*]{} if there is a diagonal matrix $B$ such that $AB$ is
symmetric.
